author: reshm
title: Win-Win Prism DID Integration
description: Win-Win, a new alternate dispute resolution marketplace powered by Cardano, needs a mechanism to trustfully connect mediators with clients.
solution: Integrate Win-Win with Atala Prism so that mediators can be verified by DIDs and universities can issue credentials to their graduates.
experience: Loxe Inc. team, experienced and hackathon winning group of Plutus and Atala PRISM pioneers, participants of Gimbalabs PPBL program.
